source.sqlReaderQuery:
MERGE [dbo].[DIM_USER] AS TARGET
USING [staging].[L_USERS] AS SOURCE 
ON (TARGET.USER_PID = SOURCE.USER_PID) 
WHEN MATCHED AND TARGET.USER_FID <> SOURCE.USER_FID OR TARGET.USER_NM <> SOURCE.USER_NM 
THEN UPDATE SET TARGET.USER_FID = SOURCE.USER_FID, TARGET.USER_NM = SOURCE.USER_NM
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET 
THEN INSERT (USER_PID,USER_FID,USER_NM,CREATION_TIMESTAMP,UPDATED_TIMESTAMP) VALUES (SOURCE.USER_PID,SOURCE.USER_FID,SOURCE.USER_NM,GETDATE(),null);
